name: Forest Plague
description: You were warned about this place. Impenetrable depths of the forest and...animals, hungry for blood. YOUR blood as there are no screwballs, wishing to hunt in this cursed place. Well, you're already here, so, let's SURVIVE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
